hr.heroSubtitle: We provide a complete solution for all our client's HR requirements - recruitment, outsourced staffing, market research and consulting, personnel administration, and company structuring.
hr.staffEvaluation_title: Evaluation and development of human resources
hr.leasing_desc: The service offers a flexible solution for employer companies who need new employees but are unwilling or unable to recruit them permanently.
hr.leasing_info1: In staff leasing we take on:
hr.leasing_info2: The advantages of this service are:
hr.leasing_info1_arg1: Selection, recruitment, and management of staff
hr.leasing_info1_arg2: Preparation, registration, conclusion, and termination of employment contracts
hr.leasing_info1_arg3: Calculation, preparation, and payment of salaries
hr.leasing_info1_arg4: Administration of all processes related to employee performance
hr.leasing_info1_arg6: Allows quality personnel selection, organized management, and administration
hr.leasing_info1_arg7: Reduces the amount of administrative work for companies
hr.staffEvaluation_desc: The service includes a comprehensive analysis of the team dynamics, skills, and personal characteristics of your employees. It is applied for both recruitment and development purposes and succession management in organizations. We predict leadership potential using tools and methodologies such as Harrison Assessment, Great People Inside, and others.
hr.marketResearch_desc: We provide you with a combination of business information, and statistical data needed for your company needs. Our team of experts will provide comprehensive market analysis and assistance in planning and implementing strategies for your human capital development. The service includes labor market information as well as expert opinion on employee and employment issues.
hr.staffAdministration_desc: We organize the preparation and drafting of contracts, orders and supplementary agreements, entry of changes in employment books, maintenance of personnel files, activities organization of working time, breaks and holidays.
hr.administration_arg1: Preparation of employment contracts, supplementary agreements, and termination orders
hr.administration_arg2: Preparation of civil contracts and accounts of amounts paid
hr.administration_arg3: Preparation and maintenance of employee files
hr.administration_arg4: Preparation and submission of notifications under Article 62(5) of the Labour Code
hr.administration_arg8: Processing of documents for temporary disability, pregnancy and childbirth and their submission to the National Social Insurance Institution
hr.administration_arg9: Representation of the company before the Labour Inspectorate, NRA, etc. Institutions regarding Social Security, Social Insurance, and Social Insurance
hr.compStructuring_desc: We help improve your company's management structure by:
hr.compStructuring_arg1: Analysis and study of the management-hierarchical structure of the company
hr.compStructuring_arg2: Building a management-hierarchical structure of the company
hr.compStructuring_arg4: Developing an internal company communication structure
hr.compStructuring_arg6: Establishment of internal company attestation model
hr.staffSearch_desc: Our team of experts specializes in permanent recruitment for select employers in a range of industries. We tailor our approach to each requirement, providing a bespoke recruitment service.
